Title: Distance
Writer: Keavy Eunice Vicente (story), Keavy Eunice Vicente (screenplay)
Actors: Iza Calzado, Therese Malvar, Nonie Buencamino, Alessandra Malonzo
Plot: Liza returns to the family that she abandoned five years ago and suddenly everyone is struggling. Struggling to stay civil. Struggling not to reopen old wounds. Struggling to stay together ...
